message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $12,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. How about $9,500?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. To be fair to both of us, I can come down to $11,000. This reflects the true value of the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $10,500.
